# value

**Instance Property**

The current value of the axis.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: Float { get }
```

## Discussion

Often a physical controller ignores values near the neutral position called the dead zone. The [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCControllerAxisInput] element handles this dead zone, and other physical constraints of a hardware control, by computing a normalized value.

The normalized value ranges from `-1` to `1`. If the value is `0`, the movement is in the dead zone. A nonzero value indicates the moment is outside of the dead zone.

## Accessing the input values

- **setValue(_:)**: Sets the normalized value of the axis.
